conclusion: Analyze the flow direction and placement of baffles to determine which container the liquid will flow into.

Baffles A, B, and C block the direct path of the liquid.

Baffle A blocks the liquid from flowing directly downward.
The liquid will likely flow to the right, bypassing the area below Baffle A.

Baffle B blocks the liquid from flowing directly downward.
